MenorahVirtualStrip.setAll: Set all pixels to same color
MenorahVirtualStrip.setAllCandles: Set all candles to the same color
MenorahVirtualStrip.setAllFlames: Set all flames to the same color
MenorahVirtualStrip.setAllMenorahBaseLig: Set all menorah base lights to the same color
MenorahVirtualStrip.setCandle:
Set color of a candle (1-9, left to right)
Candle 1 = leftmost, Candle 5 = shammash (middle), Candle 9 = rightmost
MenorahVirtualStrip.setFlame:
Set color of a flame (1-9, left to right)
Flame 1 = leftmost, Flame 9 = rightmost
MenorahVirtualStrip.setMenorahBaseLight:
Set color of a menorah base light (1-9, row by row, left to right)
Base Light 1 = top left, Base Light 9 = bottom center
MenorahVirtualStrip.setPixelColor: Set color of pixel at index (0-26)
input:
Respond to and read data from buttons and sensors.

Events and data from sensors.
menorah.initMotionSensor: Initialize the motion sensor - call this once at the start
menorah.isMotionDetected: Check if motion is detected - returns true if someone moved nearby
